com.ashysystem.mbhq.view.TextViewSemiBol.android:text: These question ask about your feelings,thought and activities during last month,including today.
IN THE LAST MONTH,HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU :
1.Been upset because of something that happened unexpectedly.
2.Felt that you were unable to control important thing in your life?
4.Felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems?
5.Felt that things were going your way?
6.Found that you could not cope with all thing you had to do?
7.Been able to control irritations in your life?
8.Felt that you were top on things?
9.Been angered beacuse of things that happend that were out of control?
10.Felt difficulties were piling up so high that you could not overcome them?
